flawed_nl_solution:
He has enough milk to make 18 milkshakes because 72 / 4 = <<72/4=18>>18
He has enough ice cream to make 16 milkshakes because 192 / 12 = <<192/12=16>>16
He can only make 16 milkshakes because 16 < 18
He will use 46 ounces of milk because 16 x 4 = <<16*4=46>>46
He will have 26 ounces of milk left because 72 - 46 = <<72-46=26>>26
#### 26

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 64, not 46. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
